question: Which of the following company partners with Airtel Payments Bank mobile wallet?
explanation: Messaging app Hike announced that it has entered into a tie-up with Airtel Payments Bank for its mobile wallet product. Owing to this tie-up, users of Hike messenger will now have access to Airtel Payments Bank's vast product line including merchant and utility payments. For the month of November 2017, management of Hike Messenger is expecting to register 5 million transactions which would include services like recharge and peer to peer transactions.
